title: Alpha Fever
description: Alpha Fever is filled with a scintillating, spicy blend of ***BRAND NEW*** contemporary and paranormal romance stories written by 24 USA Today, Amazon, International, and Award Winning Bestselling Authors wrapped up in one amazing boxed set!Black Velvet by Elianne AdamsHedging Her Bets by Erzabet BishopThe Butterfly Collector by Muffy WilsonBillionaire Dominance by Rozlyn Sparks & Abi AikenThe Invitation by Jacintha TopazThe Thrill of the Chase by Elvira BathoryTemporary Wife by Tara CrescentHidden Desire by Crystal DawnBetween the Marshal & the Vampire by Tricia OwensHope's Edge by D. F. KriegerDream Job by Abby HayesHeal Me by A.C. NixonHade's Playground by Isis PierceCowboy Boots & Handcuffs by Gina Kincade & Kiki HowellShimmers in the Dark by Bethany ShawClub Stratosphere: Lexa and Tom by Danielle GavanUntil We Meet Again by Paige MatthewsAlways You by Tierney O'MalleyFake It Til You Mate It by Jacqueline SweetSwitching Up  by Angelica DawsonWatch the Skies by Tanith DavenportSinister Outlaw by Dawn White
author: Gina Kincade
